summary: This is a brief email from December 18, 2018, indicating that the sender's team is about to begin contacting attorneys for victims to set up interviews, suggesting an investigative or legal process related to the Epstein case was moving forward.

events.title: Plan to Contact Victim Attorneys
events.description: The sender states their team is going to start contacting attorneys for the victims to set up interviews.

keyFacts: The email is dated December 18, 2018, a time when investigations into Jeffrey Epstein were active.
The sender indicates an intention to begin contacting attorneys representing victims of Epstein.
The purpose of the contact is to set up interviews with the victims, suggesting a formal investigative or legal process was underway.
